Total Costs of Investigations: There have been 20 independent counsel or special prosecutor investigations initiated under the statutory mechanisms originally enacted as part of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978. The independent counsel investigations initiated under the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 have cost approximately $228,712,589 as of September 30, 2005. Only two federal officials who were the named subjects of the 20 independent counsel investigations were convicted or pleaded guilty to charges brought against them.
